Hero:
1.Epic Hero – Vexana
Dark/Mage
Vexana was the queen of Fjellborg. Being the kind and benevolent queen, she was held in high esteem by her subjects. But later the king became a slave of power and exiled her. The king's betrayal razed the queen's sanity in flames of rage. She made a deal with the Lord of the Abyss to regaining her youth and beauty. As a result, she turned into the Necromancer.
Vexana’s Ultimate “Cursed Oath” grants her the ability to summon a puppet of the enemy Hero when the cursed enemy dies. Vexana always targets at the most fragile enemy unit, her Skill “Nether Snare” deals damage to the target with the lowest HP. Her Passive “Necromancy Power” enables her to deal more damage to enemies with less HP; and her 2nd Passive “Necromancy Spell” detonates the marked enemies, making up for the lack of AoE damage.

New Feature:
1.Akashic Ruins
-When Campaign 16-10 is clear, Akashic Ruins will be available in “Suburb”. Players can follow Layla and her team to explore the ruins in the legend and discover the secrets that have been buried in the history.
-In each stage, players will have to make logical route planning, find their way in the maze with limited resources provided, and obtain the extraordinary Artifacts.
-It may take several challenges to obtain all the loots in a stage.
-Brand-new Hero, Vexana, will be added to the Chapter EX of the Akashic Ruins. Clear this chapter to obtain Vexana for free.
2.Artifacts
-15 Legendary Artifacts have appeared in the Land of Dawn, each one of them is unique. Players have to explore the Akashic Ruins to obtain them.
-Artifacts are special Equipment which boost the power of Heroes drastically. Artifacts possess different effects. Utilize them according to the actual battles and your Hero specialties!
3.Guild Party
-During the Guild Party, players will be able to see obtainable rewards.
-Newly added the feature where players could request Tarot Cards from other Guild members by tapping the empty slots. The players who provided Tarot Cards will get rewards.
-When players join the Guild Parties of other Guild members, there’s a chance of obtaining extra Guild Coins.
-Added a button for players to directly enter the next Party Room. Now players can easily switch Party Rooms to enter.
-Boosted the Reward Chests of Guild Party. Now more partiers means better Reward Chests.
4.Labyrinth & Dungeons
-The truth about the mysterious Dungeons is gradually revealed. Now the story of Claude and Dexter will be triggered as the player progresses in Dungeons.
5.Tower of Babel
-Now when the player’s battle power greatly exceeds the recommended battle power of that floor, the “Skip” feature will show up in the Hero Selection Screen which the player can choose to skip the battle and obtain victory directly.
6.Campaign
-Now Campaign has 43 chapters. Some changes have happened to the Land of Dawn after the Twilight Orb arrived at the Land of Dawn. New adventures are about to start.
7.Fusion Shrine
-In the Character Dismantle tab, players can choose to auto-dismantle the common characters obtained.
